section.name: Login as author
section.span: How to login to Hippo CMS as author of documents, images and/or files.

div.p: Marc logs in to Hippo CMS. He has typed his password, but only bullets are shown, to prevent someone looking over his shoulder from reading it. He chose the Hippo CMS to be in English. Now he is about to press the button marked 'login'. (About using the screenshots.)

section.p: Each time one starts working with Hippo CMS one has to login to it, identifying oneself. This ensures that no unauthorized persons can get access to Hippo CMS.

After starting Hippo CMS you will be presented with a login dialog. Type your Hippo CMS username and password. These must been given to you by your Hippo CMS administrator. You can change your password later.

If usernames are not yet defined for your Hippo CMS, then you may use the default username and password: username=author, password=author. Note that in this case, your Hippo CMS is not yet protected by the login procedure, as anyone can read this.
